summary: This document is an email chain from May 24, 2021, in which attorney Jason Foy forwards a threatening email received by his partner, James Seplowitz, to a government contact (Eric Sarraga). Foy interprets the email as a threat against his safety, likely related to his representation of a client, and requests a government investigation into its credibility.

persons.name: Jason Foy
persons.context: Attorney at Foy & Seplowitz LLC who forwards a threatening email to a government contact, interpreting it as a threat against his safety and requesting an investigation.

persons.name: James Seplowitz
persons.context: Partner at Foy & Seplowitz LLC who received the initial threatening email, which was then forwarded to Jason Foy.

persons.name: Eric Sarraga
persons.context: Government recipient (likely at USAO NYS) copied on the email chain, to whom Jason Foy reports the perceived threat and requests an investigation.

persons.name: Vegas Army Vet
persons.context: Anonymous sender of the threatening email directed at James Seplowitz, with the message 'Go ahead let your client know, THIS ISN'T OVER!!'

connections.description: Partners at the law firm Foy & Seplowitz LLC, as indicated by the email signature and reference to 'my partner'.
Foy is communicating a security concern to Sarraga, a government contact, requesting an investigation.
Seplowitz received a threatening email from the sender 'Vegas Army Vet'.

events.title: Threatening Email Received
events.description: Attorney James Seplowitz receives an email from 'Vegas Army Vet' containing the message 'Go ahead let your client know, THIS ISN'T OVER!!', which Jason Foy interprets as a threat.

events.title: Request for Government Investigation
events.description: Jason Foy forwards the threatening email to government contact Eric Sarraga, requesting an expedited investigation into its credibility.

locations: Foy & Seplowitz LLC (law firm location implied)
keyFacts: Attorney Jason Foy received a forwarded email he interpreted as a direct threat to his safety, prompting him to contact government authorities.
The threatening email was sent to his law partner, James Seplowitz, from an individual using the alias 'Vegas Army Vet'.
The threat's message, 'Go ahead let your client know, THIS ISN'T OVER!!', suggests it is related to the firm's legal representation of a client.
Foy formally requested the government to investigate the threat's credibility, indicating serious concern over its potential validity.
